Class BaseTower

java.lang.Object
logic.components.BaseEntity
logic.components.towers.BaseTower
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArcherTower, FireTower, IceTower, LaserTower
public abstract class BaseTower extends BaseEntity
The abstract engine for all defensive structures.

Handles the core gameplay loop for towers: 1. Cooldown management (Rate of Fire). 2. Target acquisition based on customizable strategies (Closest, First, Weakest, etc.). 3. Spawning projectiles (Shooting).

    • BaseTower

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(GameController controller, List<BaseEntity> allEntities)
      Dependency Injection for the tower. Necessary because towers need to know about the world (entities) to find targets.

    • update

      public void update()
      The heartbeat of the tower. Called every game frame.

    • shoot

      protected void shoot(BaseEnemy target)
      Creates a projectile aimed at the target. Can be overridden by subclasses (like IceTower) for instant effects.

    • findTarget

      protected BaseEnemy findTarget()
      Scans the entity list to find the best target based on the current strategy.

    • cycleStrategy

      public void cycleStrategy()
      Cycles through available targeting strategies. Called when the player clicks the "Strategy" button in the UI.

    • setBulletImage

      public void setBulletImage(javafx.scene.image.Image img)
